News.headline: Quiz Night At The Daggers
News.short_description: The Daggers will be hosting a quiz night on Saturday 25th March, with a 8pm start.
News.description:
Tables for the quiz night can be booked for up to eight people per table, although people wishing to attend are advised to bring their own food for the evening.

There will be a lichened bar for people attending the quiz night and there will also be a raffle during the evening.

Tickets for the quiz night are Â£5.00 per person with all of the proceeds being raised for Diabetes UK.

Anyone wishing to book a table, please ring Marlene on 01708 459 677.
